Body: Do the Latin stress rules (antepenultimate if penultimate is light, penultimate if heavy) have any known exceptions? Also, sometimes the rule assigns antepenultimate stress to a syllable belonging to a prefix — does the rule apply regardless?
Title: Latin stress rules: exceptions

LastEditedUser.AboutMe: I am a rock climber & a linguist.

OwnerUser.AboutMe:
I am a computational linguistics PhD candidate. But before that, long before that, I fell in love with languages.

By the way, if you're addicted to Stack Exchange and use iOS, check out Stackwise for iOS and browse Stack Exchange beautifully.
